channel.title: Restrictions?
channel.description: Ok so I recently made my PI server FREE SPAWN but I want to restrict a few items, can someone tell me the basis of doing this, no spoonfeed?

item.title: Restrictions?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“lowbrow, post:5, topic:425805”]“I’d say instead of editing player classes you need to edit the actuall spawn command, add an exception for the items when they use the command.”

That might just make the item disabled for the player rights, so instead of admins being able to equip the admin is unable to equip. Which might work for users in the player rights of say 1 (if that is the basic user player right)[/quote]

then Admins couldnt use some items…i dont think thats what he wants.

Read full topic

item.title: Restrictions?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

“I’d say instead of editing player classes you need to edit the actuall spawn command, add an exception for the items when they use the command.”

That might just make the item disabled for the player rights, so instead of admins being able to equip the admin is unable to equip. Which might work for users in the player rights of say 1 (if that is the basic user player right)

Read full topic

item.title: Restrictions?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“lowbrow, post:3, topic:425805”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=528467.msg3854145#msg3854145 date=1324238398]
something like:
if ( i == ####)
sM("@red@You Cant spwan this item");
or something…
[/quote]
that just sends a message. Now i havent programmed a server in months but what i can tell you is just add player rights after the “if ( i == ####)” or else everytime you spawn the item or everytime you use the item you’ll get a message with no consequences. I’d say instead of editing player classes you need to edit the actuall spawn command, add an exception for the items when they use the command.[/quote]
yeah…maby:
if ( i == ####) && (playerRights=3) {
//the allow code here
} Else {
sM("@red@ u cant spawn that");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Restrictions?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:2, topic:425805”]something like:
if ( i == ####)
sM("@red@You Cant spwan this item");
or something…[/quote]
that just sends a message. Now i havent programmed a server in months but what i can tell you is just add player rights after the “if ( i == ####)” or else everytime you spawn the item or everytime you use the item you’ll get a message with no consequences. I’d say instead of editing player classes you need to edit the actuall spawn command, add an exception for the items when they use the command.

Read full topic
